item.title: My first week with Python, Django & Google App Engine
item.description: This post details the journey through my first week working with Python, Django & Google App Engine. I've had ups and downs (many!), but overall I've come out loving the three of them!
item.dc:creator: Damian Mullins

item.title: 2015 the year ahead
item.description: Last year was full of change, I got engaged(!), refocused on client side development, worked in an (proper) agile scrum team for the first time, attended my first meetup, architected a custom adaptive framework using SCSS, and finally, left my job at the very end of the year to chase new challenges.
item.dc:creator: Damian Mullins

item.title: Use PowerShell to npm uninstall all packages
item.description: Recently I needed to delete all npm package folders which had been installed into the `node_modules` directory of a project. Attempting to manually delete the folders occasionally failed due to the maximum path length limitation Windows imposes.
item.dc:creator: Damian Mullins

item.title: Importing ASP.NET MVC 6 Tag Helpers
item.description: The @addTagHelper directive allows you to use Tag Helpers inside of your razor views.
item.dc:creator: Damian Mullins

item.title: IE is dying
item.description: Microsoft has dropped support for Internet Explorer 8, 9 and 10 as of 12th January.
item.dc:creator: Damian Mullins
